mapper.select: SELECT m_number AS phone, password, user_srl AS userSrl, user_name AS userName, addr, detail_addr AS detailAddr, auth, company_name AS companyName, s_number AS companyPhone FROM users WHERE m_number = #{phone}
SELECT user_srl AS userSrl, user_name AS userName, m_number AS phone, company_name AS companyName, s_number AS companyPhone, addr, detail_addr AS detailAddr FROM users WHERE user_srl = #{userSrl}

SELECT COUNT(o.obj_srl) AS totalCnt, ( SELECT COUNT(o.obj_srl) FROM obj AS o INNER JOIN users AS u ON o.user_srl = u.user_srl WHERE u.master_srl = #{userSrl} AND o.obj_status IN ('warehousing_new','warehousing') ) AS innerCount, ( SELECT COUNT(o.obj_srl) FROM obj AS o INNER JOIN users AS u ON o.user_srl = u.user_srl WHERE u.master_srl = #{userSrl} AND o.obj_status IN ('release_new','release','shipping','warehousing_wait') ) AS outerCount FROM obj AS o INNER JOIN users AS u ON o.user_srl = u.user_srl WHERE u.master_srl = #{userSrl}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( user_name, auth, password, company_name, addr, detail_addr, m_number, s_number, email, latitude, longitude, grade ) VALUES ( #{userName}, 'holder', #{password}, #{companyName}, #{detailAddr}, #{addr}, #{phone}, #{companyPhone}, #{email}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, 'A' )
mapper.select: SELECT user_srl AS userSrl FROM users WHERE m_number = #{phone}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company_certificate ( business_number, user_srl, certificate_image ) VALUES ( #{businessNumber}, #{userSrl}, #{certificateImage} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM company_certificate WHERE business_number = #{businessNumber}
